list.title: Dashboard
list.description: This is the dashboard that will be displayed when the user logs in. It will display the buttons that the user can press to navigate to different screens. As well as the profile picture and other relevant widgets like social media feed, etc.

list.title: LoginMicrosoft
list.description: This is the login screen for the application. It will allow the user to login using their Microsoft account. It will then redirect the user to the dashboard screen.

list.title: TwitterFeed
list.description: This function creates the twitter feed that will be displayed on the screen. It will display the twitter feed of the user. It will also call the onPress function when the user presses the button. It will also set the background color and text color of the button and the twitter feed. It will also set the twitter feed to be displayed on the screen using the Twitter API.

list.title: AnimatedPressable
list.description: This is the animated component that will be animated when the user presses a button. Different from Touchable

list.title: AnimatedTouchable
list.description: This is the touchable that will be displayed on the screen. It will be animated.

list.title: AVATAR_SIZE
list.description: This is the size of the avatar that will be displayed on the screen.

list.title: buttonHeight
list.description: This is the height of the buttons on the dashboard.

list.title: componentDidMount
list.description: This function will be called when the component is mounted. It will set the twitter feed to be displayed on the screen using the Twitter API.

list.title: DATA
list.description: Create FlatList

list.title: DATA2
list.description: The short links that will be displayed on the bottom of the screen. It will display the buttons that the user can press to navigate to different screens for the short links at the bottom of the screen. As well as the profile picture and other relevant widgets like social media feed, etc.

list.title: Doctors
list.description:
Function to give feedback to doctors

  • user must click of doctors name to give feedback

list.title: EventNotification
list.description: This function will send a notification to the user when an event is created. Implemented by using the expo-notifications package.

list.title: ICON_SIZE
list.description: This is the size of the icon that will be displayed on the screen.

list.title: Item
list.description: This function creates the button that will be displayed on the screen. It will display the title, destination, image and text of the item. It will also call the onPress function when the user presses the button. It will also set the background color and text color of the button.

list.title: ITEM_SIZE
list.description: This is the size of the item that will be displayed on the screen. Gets the size of the screen and subtracts the spacing.

list.title: LoginFirebase
list.description:
Function to login to firebase

  • when login is pressed

list.title: propTypes
list.description: Sets the type of the props that will be used in the Twitter Feed class.

list.title: render
list.description: This function will render the twitter feed to be embedded on the screen. It will set the background color and text color of the twitter feed and handle the HTML of the twitter feed, using the embedHtml state.

list.title: setupUrl
list.description: This function will set the twitter feed to be displayed on the screen using the Twitter API. It fetches the twitter feed from the Wits University Twitter page, using the state of the prop witsUrl.

list.title: SPACING
list.description: This is the spacing between the items that will be displayed on the screen.

list.title: textPos
list.description: This is the position of the text on the dashboard. Positions the text based on the height of the button.
